configuration:
<% if hadoop_security_authentication == "kerberos" %>
dfs.block.access.token.enable true
dfs.https.address <%= hadoop_namenode_host %>:50475
dfs.https.port 50475
dfs.namenode.keytab.file /etc/hdfs.keytab
dfs.namenode.kerberos.principal hdfs/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
dfs.namenode.kerberos.https.principal host/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
dfs.secondary.http.address <%= hadoop_namenode_host %>:0
dfs.secondary.https.address <%= hadoop_namenode_host %>:50495
dfs.secondary.https.port 50495
dfs.secondary.namenode.keytab.file /etc/hdfs.keytab
dfs.secondary.namenode.kerberos.principal hdfs/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
dfs.secondary.namenode.kerberos.https.principal host/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
dfs.datanode.data.dir.perm 700
dfs.datanode.address 0.0.0.0:1004
dfs.datanode.http.address 0.0.0.0:1006
dfs.datanode.keytab.file /etc/hdfs.keytab
dfs.datanode.kerberos.principal hdfs/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
dfs.datanode.kerberos.https.principal host/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
<% end %>
fs.default.name hdfs://<%= hadoop_namenode_host %>:<%= hadoop_namenode_port%>
dfs.data.dir <%= hdfs_data_dirs.join(",") %>
dfs.name.dir <%= namenode_data_dirs.join(",") %>
dfs.permissions.superusergroup hadoop The name of the group of super-users.
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_dfs_namenode_plugins") %>
dfs.namenode.plugins <%= hadoop_dfs_namenode_plugins %> Comma-separated list of namenode plug-ins to be activated.
<% end %> <% if has_variable?("hadoop_dfs_datanode_plugins") %>
dfs.datanode.plugins <%= hadoop_dfs_datanode_plugins %> Comma-separated list of datanode plug-ins to be activated.
<% end %> <% if has_variable?("hadoop_namenode_thrift_port") %>
dfs.thrift.address 0.0.0.0:<%= hadoop_namenode_thrift_port %>
<% end %>
dfs.datanode.max.xcievers 4096
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_dfs_block_size") %>
dfs.block.size <%= hadoop_config_dfs_block_size %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_namenode_handler_count") %>
dfs.namenode.handler.count <%= hadoop_config_namenode_handler_count %>
<% end %>
dfs.webhdfs.enabled true
